attributes.action: Dissolve parliament immediately and set a date for election in order to avoid accusations of treason against Queen and country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has become abundantly clear that the present government do not have the necessary trust or mandate of the people of this country.  They are holding onto power by the skin of their teeth to serve themselves and not the people whom they are supposed to be serving.  This could easily be interpreted as treacherous.  The country is suffering each and every day until a new government is installed.  Gordon Brown should now show some backbone and do the right thing for the country and not for himself.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
